comment._content: Before the 1898 extentionsand alterations.  GPO clock was installed in 1891.  It looks like Moore Street was being altered and widened into Martin Place.

comment.author: 35951588@N07
comment._content: The Clock tower was erected in 1887, and the clock faces and bell remained absent until 1891.
